Date: Thursday, 5/1/1998
Subject: Progress of Alex Cora
Dear Sir,
Alex Cora has an AVG of .287 at AA Binghamton Mets!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Ryan Drese
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
